meanings.sent1: The old, rubbishy toys were scattered across the floor.
meanings.sent2: The alley was filled with rubbishy trash bags.
meanings.sent3: The rubbishy costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a rubbishy tornado had passed through.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the rubbishy dumpster lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The cheap, rubbishy jewelry broke easily.
meanings.sent2: The movie received bad reviews for its rubbishy plot.
meanings.sent3: She regretted buying the rubbishy knock-off purse.
meanings.sent4: The old car was so rubbishy, it barely ran anymore.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the food was so rubbishy, she couldn't finish it.
